jobsList.description: Salary £39,000- £42,000 per annum dependant on experience - North West London - Head Office Based 4 days per week/1 WFH day - Full Time - Monday to Friday 9am to 5pm. On an exclusive consultancy basis, C2 Recruitment are hiring for an Assistant Accountant for a Luxury homewares/furniture brand who manufacturers and retails at the very top end of the market. With an international brand presence this is an amazing opportunity to join a company who really cares about their teams. We are looking for a bright and motivated Assistant Accountant to work as part of a small, but very busy Finance team. The successful candidate will be responsible for all areas of accounts for the company and international subsidiaries and some general administrative duties within the role. * Processing purchase and sales ledger * Processing of expenses and credit cards.

jobsList.description: Position Summary - Our vision is to bring Samsung Europe efficient operations. This role needs to meet different colleague such as EO and subsidiary people sometimes to encourage or to support. So, the role are very dynamic and exciting role. You can learn how to handle the companys resource and see the risk factors by doing this role. Role and Responsibilities * EO Marketing budget management & controlling (request approval, yearly planning) * Report & analyse cost for Europe subsidiaries & Europe Office monthly & quarterly * Financial role of recharging EO cost to Europe subsidiaries, contract management for EO service to Subs. * Financial data preparation for TAX audit * Lead daily/weekly/monthly assessment of risk monitoring rules to evaluate efficiency, identify improvements to improve fraud detection capabilities and reduce false positives.

jobsList.description: About the role - Great Britain's electricity system is undergoing an ambitious, exciting and vital transformation. Together with industry, we are creating a cleaner, greener system, one that protects the planet and serves generations to come. The Processing and Invoicing Analyst is responsible for delivering efficient and effective Accounts Payable and Procurement-related support services to suppliers and business stakeholders, ensuring compliance with business and regulatory controls and supporting the financial performance of the business. This role will be based at our Warwick office, with occasional travel to our Wokingham office, and we continue to offer hybrid working from office and home. About us - At National Grid Electricity System Operator (ESO), were aiming to operate a zero-carbon electricity system for Great Britain by 2025.

jobsList.description: Salary: £58,500 - £62,900 per annum (pro rata), plus generous benefits and an average employer pension contribution of 27%. Existing civil servants should refer to the Further Information document for salary details. Working Pattern: Full time/ Part time/ Job share/ Flexible working - Join the Submarine Delivery Agency (SDA) in this key specialist role as a Senior Qualified Accountant. This is a role offering significant scope, with responsibility across delivery, policy, strategic direction,and leadership. The Submarine Production (SMP) team is responsible for managing the build and Sea Trials of Astute Class submarines prior to entry into service, working closely with suppliers and a wide stakeholder base. jobsList.description: We have an exciting opportunity for a hardworking and established individual to permanently join our clients Finance Team at their facility in Troon. This is a role that would suit a person that has experience with accounts payable coupled with excellent attention to detail and numeracy skills. Reporting to the Head of Finance, the Purchase Ledger Assistant will ensure the smooth running of the purchase ledger and payments process, cash book and to provide administration support. Key Responsibilities - Obtaining appropriate authorisation of purchase invoices. Reconciling haulage invoices to shipments in ERP system. Reconciling and matching log supplier and haulier invoices to the system. Matching maintenance purchase orders to invoices. Cleansing Goods received not invoiced. jobsList.label: NEW

Days, Monday to Friday(hydrid working - 2 days WFH, 3 days in office) 12 month Maternity Cover Fixed Term Contract * This opportuinty would be siuited for someone with an administration background,looking for an opportunity to develop personaly within accounts payable.
